org.spongepowered.api.text.format

Class TextFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.format.TextFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextElement

    public final class TextFormat
extends Object
implements TextElement
    Represents a pair of TextStyle and TextColor.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TextFormat NONE
      An empty TextFormat with no TextColor and no TextStyle.

      • merge

        public TextFormat merge(TextFormat format)
        Returns a new TextFormat that combines this and the given format. The given format takes higher priority than this one. Due to this the color will only fallback to this one if the given format's color is TextColors.NONE. If the given format's color is TextColors.RESET then TextColors.NONE will be used. Styles are combined using TextStyle.and(TextStyle...).
        Parameters:
        format - The format to merge
        Returns:
        The new text format

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns whether this TextFormat has no color and format specified.
        Returns:
        If the format does not contain a color or any styles
